data.name: Mysterio
data.description: Mysterio is an enigmatic Controller who manipulates his enemies' status effects.

starItems.name: Mysterio
starItems.description: Mysterio is an enigmatic Controller who manipulates his enemies' status effects.

1.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>

2.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>

3.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

4.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>

5.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>1</color>-<color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

6.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects

7.description:
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
Gain <color=#86e619>+1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked or dodged.

1.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to all enemies instead.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
1.nextUpgrade: <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target

2.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to all enemies instead.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally

3.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to all enemies instead.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.

<color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
Always apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random ally

4.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to all enemies instead.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.

<color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
<color=#86e619>30%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random ally.
4.nextUpgrade:
Always gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance gain an assist from a random ally

5.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to all enemies instead.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.

Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random ally.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> chance gain an assist from a random ally
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target

6.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to all enemies instead.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.

Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
<color=#86e619>70%</color> chance to gain an assist from a random ally.
6.nextUpgrade:
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent target
Always gain an assist from a random ally

7.description:
Apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to the primary target.
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Blind</color> to all enemies instead.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.
Apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random adjacent enemy.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.

Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> ally.
Gain an assist from a random ally.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target.
1.nextUpgrade:
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, flip all positive effects on all enemies
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this action gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, flip all positive effects on all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, flip all positive effects on all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target and <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
Summon a Mirror Image for each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, flip all positive effects on all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target and <color=#86e619>1</color> random enemy.

Summon a Mirror Image for each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> Mirror Images, then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to <color=#86e619>2</color> random enemies

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, flip all positive effects on all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target and <color=#86e619>2</color> random enemies.

Summon a Mirror Image for each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> Mirror Images, then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>290%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, flip all positive effects on all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target and <color=#86e619>2</color> random enemies.

Summon a Mirror Image for each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> Mirror Images, then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all enemies

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>350%</color> damage.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color> or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, flip all positive effects on all enemies.

Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns and <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.

Summon a Mirror Image for each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color> Mirror Images, then lose all <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, this attack gains <color=#86e619>+100,000%</color> Extra Focus.

1.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
 > Summon <color=#86e619>1</color> Mirror Image.

On Death, summon <color=#86e619>1</color> Mirror Image with <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

On Mirror Image Death, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus per non-summoned <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally.
1.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>+2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a max of <color=#86e619>5</color>
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health

2.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#86e619>+2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Summon <color=#86e619>1</color> Mirror Image.

On Death, summon <color=#86e619>1</color> Mirror Image with <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

On Mirror Image Death, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus per non-summoned <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally.
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>
On Death, summon <color=#86e619>2</color> Mirror Images

3.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#86e619>+2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Summon <color=#86e619>1</color> Mirror Image.

On Death, summon <color=#86e619>2</color> Mirror Images with <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. One of the Mirror Images has their Special Ability.

On Mirror Image Death, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus per non-summoned <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally.
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, summon <color=#86e619>2</color> Mirror Images
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies
If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color>, or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>

4.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#86e619>+2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Summon <color=#86e619>2</color> Mirror Images.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color>, or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

On Death, summon <color=#86e619>2</color> Mirror Images with <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
One of the Mirror Images has their Special Ability.

On Mirror Image Death, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus per non-summoned <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally.
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn, summon <color=#86e619>3</color> Mirror Images
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, on Death, summon an additional Mirror Image
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Max Health

5.description:
On Spawn:
 > Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>SINISTER SIX</color> allies.
 > Gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, gain <color=#86e619>+2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > Summon <color=#86e619>3</color> Mirror Images.

If this character has <color=#86e619>2</color>, or more <color=#fff568>SUPERIOR SIX</color> allies, enemies cannot gain <color=#fff568>Immunity</color>.

On Death, summon <color=#86e619>2</color> Mirror Images with <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>. One of the Mirror Images has their Special Ability.
In <color=#fff568>WAR</color>, summon an additional Mirror Image with <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.

On Mirror Image Death, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus per non-summoned <color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> ally.
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Focus.
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
